channel.title: Minecraft crashes Ubuntu
channel.description: Hello my Minecraft keeps crashing Ubuntu randomly. I have no idea why this happens, sometimes it runs for hours, other times it crashes in a few minutes. I am using Coonhunter's launcher if that makes any difference. I know it is minecraft because I placed it in a different workspace and it only crashed when I switched to that workspace.

item.title: Minecraft crashes Ubuntu
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Dunno but the laptop doesn’t actually shut down the OS just crashes.

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft crashes Ubuntu
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

Could be possible overheating?

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft crashes Ubuntu
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

It wouldnt be my launcher as I did the ‘hacking’ under Ubuntu 10.04, but tested under Ubuntu 10.04, 11.04 and Windows XP, Win7. Your graphics card may be going bad. I would find out if there is any free software to test it or something.

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft crashes Ubuntu
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

Fun fact - mac-68 in my uni’s lab always used get the mac screen of death when doing anything graphics related (minecraft, youtube, etc). They’re all identical, so I could only assume it was a hardware fault. Same problem?

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft crashes Ubuntu
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Yeah it’s weird because problems occur on windows 7 too with my graphics card crashing (also happens with youtube videos no idea why :/).

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft crashes Ubuntu
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Happens to me on my computer, but is fine on my laptop. Which is fitting because I only ever play on my laptop! Never actually looked into a cause of it though

Read full topic
